They a__ even mo__ likely t_ attend col____. Unfortunately, the government does not help pay for education before a child is in kindergarten.
data.fullContent: It's extremely important that children attend preschool. It has been shown that children who go to preschool do better in school later in life. They are even more likely to attend college. Unfortunately, the government does not help pay for education before a child is in kindergarten.
data.answer: 孩子上学前班是非常重要的。有研究表明，上过学前班的孩子在以后的学习中表现得更好。他们甚至更有可能上大学。不幸的是，政府并不能帮助孩子在上幼儿园之前支付教育费用。
